name: Dice Knight (Dark Blue Dragon Games)
description:
In Dice Knights, you play as a knight who uses dice as a weapon. You must delve into the depths of a randomly generated dungeon fighting monsters and collecting gold. You can spend this gold in the shop to get new dice.

This game was made in 48 hours for GMTK Game Jam 2022.

With the exception of the player, the enemies, and two icons all art was created in the 48-hour time frame. 

Music: by Alexander Nakarada (www.serpentsoundstudios.com)
